amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations to improve trucking security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4959 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4959 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S9567-9574) To require the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations to improve trucking security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4959 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4959 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Pryor.
